name: World's Doom: Mission Salvation
description:
The game is available in English and Portuguese (PT-BR).

People don't know it, but the world they know is about to fall apart. However… Hope is not yet lost.

To prevent the world from collapsing and stop the arrival of the thirsty dark lord, two heroines rise to save humanity.

Join Lauren and Caroline on a journey of drama, joy, pain, and new friendships!


This game was made entirely for April fools' purpose.  

Colorful MIRAI Renting Love from Christmas
  • 2 MC (Predefined name and face)
  • 10 Love Interests
  • 12k words (1h-2h of gameplay)
  • Available in English and Portuguese

  • Blind friendly (Self-voicing and ALT text for images)
  • Deaf friendly (Audio description/subtitles)
  • RenPy's accessibility menu for font features

All music and SFX are CC/Public domain!

  • Press ENTER, LEFT CLICK, or SPACE to proceed through the story
  • Press V to enable Self-voicing
  • Press A to open RenPy's font accessibility menu
  • Press H to hide the dialogue box
  • Press S to take screenshots
